verifyYourIdentitySubTitle: For the security of your account and assets, please verify your identity first.
featureIsNotAvailableYetTips: For the security of your account and assets, please verify your identity before using this service.
tellYourNameAndNation: Please tell us your name and nationality
enterFullLegalNameTips: Please enter your legal name on your passport or ID in English
thanksForYourVerificationSubTitle: We have received your identity verification and will complete the review in 1-2 working days. Thank you for your patience!
featureIsNotAvailableRejectTips: Your identity verification was rejected and cannot be re-verified
limitEnglishAndNumTips: Only English and numbers are supported
limitPostcodeTips: Please enter the correct post code
regionNotSupported: We temporarily do not provide services to users in this residence country/region, please use another residence address. Sorry for the inconvenience!
deliveryNotSupported: We are currently unable to provide mailing services to:

If you may require mailing service in the future (such as mailing a physical card), please make sure that you can provide a mailing address that is not on the list of countries/regions above, otherwise the mailing may fail. Sorry for the inconvenience!
shippingNotSupported: We are currently unable to provide mailing services to: {names}。Please use a different mailing address. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause!
